Class Details

[line 23]
Parses a HTML document

Functionality can be extended by overriding functions or adjusting the tag map. Document may contain small errors, the parser will try to recover and resume parsing.




[ Top ]

Class Variables

$custom_char_map = array(
      '<' => self::TOK_TAG_OPEN,
      '>' => self::TOK_TAG_CLOSE,
      "'" => 'parse_string',
      '"' => 'parse_string',
      '/' => self::TOK_SLASH_FORWARD,
      '\\' => self::TOK_SLASH_BACKWARD,
      '=' => self::TOK_EQUALS
   )
